translation.en: My generation, we were born into war.
translation.ja: 俺たちは戦争の最中(さなか)に 生まれた

translation.en: Giant monsters attacked our world.
translation.ja: 世界を化け物が襲った

translation.en: We called them Kaiju.
They came through the Breach.
translation.ja: 奴らは “時空の裂け目”から来た

translation.en: A gateway to another dimension at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean.
translation.ja: 太平洋の海底の 異次元へ続く扉から

translation.en: They were sent by an alien race on the other side,
translation.ja: 奴らを送り込んだのは⸺

translation.en: the Precursors.
translation.ja: 異次元生命体(プリカーサー)

translation.en: We fought back, building our own monsters.
translation.ja: 人類は戦うために 怪物を造った

translation.en: Jaegers, giant robots.
translation.ja: 巨大ロボット “イェーガー”だ

translation.en: So big, they needed two pilots to run 'em.
translation.ja: パイロット２人で操縦する

translation.en: My father was one of 'em.
translation.ja: パイロットだった親父は⸺

translation.en: He sacrificed himself to help save the world.
translation.ja: 命を捨て 世界を救った

translation.en: I am not my father.
It's been 10 years since we won the war and closed the Breach.
translation.ja: 戦争に勝ち 裂け目を閉じてから10年

translation.en: Most of the world's recovered.
But a few coastal cities never did.
translation.ja: 崩壊したままの街もある

translation.en: And the world is still picking up the pieces.
translation.ja: 世界は立ち直る途中だ

translation.en: But some of us live better in a broken world.
translation.ja: だが壊れた世界が 向いてる者もいる

translation.en: And squatting in half a mansion is better than paying for some crappy apartment.
translation.ja: 壊れた豪邸の方が 安アパートよりマシだ

translation.en: Now, in the relief zones, you have to get creative. You have to hustle,
translation.ja: 被災者居留区では ずる賢く立ち回らないと⸺

translation.en: or somebody else might eat your breakfast.
- And your cookies. -
And your damn hot sauce.
You know, out here, we place a different value on things.
translation.ja: ここは他の街と 物の価値が違う

translation.en: The Pan Pacific Defense Corps usually looks the other way as long as you don't go poking around where you don't belong.
translation.ja: 環太平洋防衛軍は ケチな犯罪は見逃してくれる

translation.en: Say, like a decommissioned Jaeger scrapyard.
translation.ja: イェーガー廃棄場に 立ち入らなければ イェーガー廃棄場に 立ち入らなければ イェーガー廃棄場

translation.en: Big risks mean big reward.
translation.ja: ここはデカい儲けになる カリフォルニア州 サンタモニカ ここはデカい儲けになる

translation.en: And nothing pays more than stolen Jaeger tech.
translation.ja: イェーガーの部品は 高く売れる

translation.en: Plenty of nutcases out here trying to slap together their own Jaegers.
translation.ja: イェーガーを造りたがる イカれ野郎は多い

translation.en: But they need the parts to do it.
translation.ja: それにはパーツが必要だ

translation.en: So if you can steal what no one else can steal,
translation.ja: 誰にも盗めない物を 盗めたら⸺

translation.en: you can live like a king.
translation.ja: 王様の暮らしができる

translation.en: Are you sure it's in here?
Power cores are stripped before they get decommissioned.
translation.ja: 動力コアは外されてるが⸺

translation.en: But sometimes they miss the tertiary plasma capacitors.
translation.ja: プラズマ蓄電器が 残ってるかも

translation.en: And that's a big score. This one's still holding a charge.
translation.ja: 使えるのがあれば大収穫だ

translation.en: You better hope so.
Okay.
Let's just calm down. Let's not get excited.
I'm just playing the odds here. You cheated Barada in Juarez, skipped out on Chau in Hong Kong.
translation.ja: お前はバラーダや 香港のチャウを だました

translation.en: Now that was a misunderstanding.
translation.ja: 誤解だ 俺のナワバリでも 盗みやがった

translation.en: And stole from me in my own backyard.
translation.ja: 俺のナワバリでも 盗みやがった

translation.en: Now I'm stealing for you. Circle of life. We good?
translation.ja: 人生の輪(サークル･オブ･ライフ)だ 今は あんたのために盗む

translation.en: You deliver,
translation.ja: ちゃんとブツがあれば⸺

translation.en: and, yeah, we're good.
translation.ja: ちゃんとブツがあれば⸺ 許そう

translation.en: Okay.
Let's get rich.
Let's.
- - Target lock.
Where is it?
Hey, man, uh, just a little situation.
It says it's here, it's supposed to be right there,
translation.ja: こいつは“ここにある”と

translation.en: but you know what, let me just figure this out.
- Target lock. -
Somebody please kill this guy for me.
Target moving.
- - No, no, no. It's here.
translation.ja: ここにある　待つんだ

translation.en: You, wait, wait! Someone else is in here.
translation.ja: ここにある　待つんだ 他の誰かが蓄電器を盗んだ

translation.en: Someone else has the capacitor.
translation.ja: 他の誰かが蓄電器を盗んだ

translation.en: - Now, let's go. Come on. - Jake!
translation.ja: 他の誰かが蓄電器を盗んだ おい ジェイク！

translation.en: Jake! Hey, wait!
You son of a...
Go! Go, go!
Split up. Go!
Come on, Jake!
Jake, Jake, Jake.
Nice try.
- Jake! - We're good.
translation.ja: ジェイク！ ザマみろ

translation.en: - Jake! -
Jake, you son of a...
Target lock. - - Target lock.
Target lock.
Hey! Get back here with that!
Target moving.
- How old are you? - Old enough to kick your ass.
translation.ja: 何歳だ？ もう大人よ

translation.en: Let's take a second. Back up. Back up.
You build this thing yourself?
What do you think?
I think I can sell your little toy for a whole lot of money.
translation.ja: このオモチャを売れば…

translation.en: Scrapper's not a toy, and she's not for sale.
translation.ja: スクラッパーは オモチャじゃない

translation.en: The man holding the pipe says she is. So listen up...
translation.ja: 俺に逆らうな　聞くんだ

translation.en: You led them here?
- That's impossible. -
Ah, what the hell, man.
Come on, come on, come on!
Yes! It works!
Okay.
Whoa, whoa, whoa! Hey! Get out.
What are you doing? No, no, no.
Where is it?  Stop! Hey!
Don't touch that. Hey! What are you doing? Stop!
translation.ja: 触らないで　何してるのよ

translation.en: - Where's the other one? - The other what?
The other cradle. A Jaeger needs two pilots.
Scrapper is small enough to run on a single neural lobe.
translation.ja: 小型だから１人で大丈夫

translation.en: All right, then you get out, and you let me pilot.
Get out!
Screw that.
- Told you she's not a toy. - You're gonna get us killed.
translation.ja: オモチャじゃない 殺されるぞ　任せろ

translation.en: - I can get us out of here. - I just got us out.
translation.ja: 殺されるぞ　任せろ 自力で逃げる

translation.en: Oh, my God.
That's November Ajax.
translation.ja: ノーベンバー･ エイジャックスだ

translation.en: Pilots of unregistered Jaeger,
translation.ja: 未登録イェーガーに告ぐ

translation.en: this is the Pan Pacific Defense Corps.
Power down and exit your Conn- Pod.
translation.ja: 動力を切り ポッドから出ろ

translation.en: No, no, no. Don't, don't, don't. Don't give up.
translation.ja: よせ　あきらめるな

translation.en: You give up way too easy.
That's what they think.
Stop.
You're in violation of Code 10 Section 14. Operation of an unregistered Jaeger.
translation.ja: 未登録イェーガーの操縦は コード10-14違反だ

translation.en: - Hang on. - I am hanging on!
translation.ja: つかまって つかまってる

translation.en: Hang tighter.
Seriously?
Stop.
See?
I just out- piloted November Ajax.
No, you didn't.
Did.
Didn't.
Okay. What do you got? And I'm not getting out.
translation.ja: どうしたらいい？ 降りないわよ

translation.en: One of those ion cells redundant?
- No! - They are now.
- But we need them. - Get up to Ajax's head.
translation.ja: 必要なの 奴の頭に乗れ

translation.en: - What? - Go!
Low power warning. Twelve percent.
I told you we needed that!
It worked, didn't it?
Eleven percent.
How long before Ajax can reboot his systems?
translation.ja: あいつ 再起動する？

translation.en: About that long.
Power down. This is your final warning.
translation.ja: 停止しろ　最後の警告だ

translation.en: All right, let's go.
Look what you did to my Jaeger, you jerk!
translation.ja: 何てことするのよ バカ！

translation.en: Should have let me pilot.
Oh, like this is my fault? You compromised my command center.
translation.ja: 司令センターに 乱入してくるからよ

translation.en: Wow. Your command center?
- Yes. My command center. - Wait. Sorry, I didn't hear that.
- Your command center? - Yes!
And you had no place to come in and try to tell me what to do.
translation.ja: 押し入って いろいろ指図した

translation.en: I go wherever I want. It's a different world.
'Cause it really worked out well, right? Look where we're at.
Your top lip and your bottom lip, they need to meet and become friends.
translation.ja: 上唇と下唇を くっつけ⸺

translation.en: They need to close up, all right? Shut up. - Shut up. Conversation done. - Yeah, I can.
translation.ja: 口を閉じてろ 話は終わりだ

translation.en: Junkyard baby.
Why did you build it?
What happened to the shutting up?
You said you wasn't gonna sell it, so what the hell was you gonna do?
Rob a bank or something?
I built her because one day, they're gonna come back.
translation.ja: 奴らが戻った時のため

translation.en: The Kaiju.
And when they do, I'm not gonna be stuck waiting for someone else to come save my ass.
translation.ja: その時は 誰かの助けを待たない

translation.en: Not like before.
You. Let's go.
Hello, Jake.
Here we are again.
Look, it's just a stretch of bad luck. I'll figure it out.
Father used to say we make our own luck.
translation.ja: お父さんは “運は自分で開け”と

translation.en: Yeah, well, Dad said a lot of things.
You were arrested in a rogue Jaeger.
translation.ja: イェーガーの違法操縦なんて

translation.en: Hold on a second. That wasn't my Jaeger. There's this little kid.
translation.ja: あれは俺のじゃない 小娘が…

translation.en: - She's about this tall... - You have priors.
This is serious.
Okay. That's why I need my big sis to help me get the hell out of here.
translation.ja: だから ここを出るため 姉さんの力を借りたい

translation.en: Just one last time.
They are not going to let you just walk.
But there might be another way.
Okay. See, that's what I wanna hear. That's what I'm here to talk about, the other way.
translation.ja: その“別の形”について 聞かせてくれ

translation.en: Lay it on me. What do I gotta do?
Re- enlist and finish what you started.
translation.ja: 防衛軍に再入隊するのよ

translation.en: I'm not doing that. Look, I'm too old to be a cadet.
translation.ja: 訓練生はイヤだ もう若くない

translation.en: I don't want you to be a cadet. I want you to help train them.
translation.ja: 違う　教官になり訓練するの

translation.en: Train who? Train what? I'm not training no damn kids.
translation.ja: 誰をだ？ ガキの世話は断る

translation.en: The transport is standing by to bring both of you to Moyulan.
translation.ja: あなたたちを モユラン基地に移す

translation.en: Both of us?
You and your new recruit.
Mako.
I can't believe she just hologrammed me.
Yeah, look. I didn't have a choice.
I know, I get it. But why me? Why do they want me for the program?
translation.ja: 分かったけど なぜ私を訓練生に？

translation.en: You built and piloted your own Jaeger. These people like that kind of stuff.
translation.ja: イェーガーを造ったから 気に入られた

translation.en: Okay, so then why am I just a cadet, and you get to be a ranger?
translation.ja: 私が訓練生で あなたはレンジャー？

translation.en: Valor Omega.
Oh, my God. That... That is Valor Omega!
translation.ja: スゴい ヴァラー･オメガだよ

translation.en: Scrapper!
You gotta be kidding me.
I didn't believe it when they told me you were inbound.
How you doing, Nate?
It's Ranger Lambert.
translation.ja: レンジャー･ランバートだ

translation.en: Are you having a laugh?
This is a military base. You remember how that works, Ranger Pentecost.
translation.ja: 隊員らしい口をきけ レンジャー･ペントコスト

translation.en: And you must be Amara Namani.
Yes, sir. Ranger, sir.
translation.ja: はい レンジャー殿

translation.en: Well, let's get you squared away.
Oh, and, uh, try not to steal anything while you're here.
translation.ja: ここでは何も盗むなよ

translation.en: Did that haircut just call you Pentecost?
As in badass Stacker Pentecost?
translation.ja: コヨーテ･タンゴに乗ってた パイロットと同じ名ね

translation.en: Pilot of Coyote Tango, hero of basically the whole world?
translation.ja: コヨーテ･タンゴに乗ってた パイロットと同じ名ね 世界を救った英雄と…

translation.en: It's just a name.
Yeah. A really cool name.
Sim training starts at 0600. You're late, you miss the day.
translation.ja: 訓練開始は0600時 遅れるなよ

translation.en: You fall behind, you'll be on the next transport back to wherever they found you.
translation.ja: 落伍者は 次の輸送機で帰らせる

translation.en: That's Titan Redeemer!
translation.ja: タイタン･リディーマーだ

translation.en: And Bracer Phoenix! She's a three- man rig!
translation.ja: ３人乗りの ブレーサー･フェニックス

translation.en: Saber Athena! I love Saber Athena!
translation.ja: セイバー･アテナよ 私 大好きなの

translation.en: She's the fastest Jaeger in the fleet. Did you know that?
translation.ja: 最速のイェーガーだよ

translation.en: Okay, so which one's yours?
Gipsy.
You pilot Gipsy Avenger?
translation.ja: ジプシー･アベンジャー？

translation.en: He used to. Until his co- pilot got a better offer in the private sector.
translation.ja: 昔 乗ってたけど 相棒が民間企業に転職

translation.en: Jules Reyes. J- Tech.
Amara. Cadet.
Jake. Ranger, apparently.
translation.ja: ジェイクだ　俺はレンジャー

translation.en: Heard a lot about you, Pentecost.
Yeah?
You know you still hold the record?
- What record? - Shut up.
So how'd they lure you back? I mean, it couldn't have been the pay, so...
translation.ja: なぜ戻ったの？ 給料目当てのはずは…

translation.en: Oh, yeah, it's a long story. But if you want to talk about it, we can meet up...
translation.ja: 長い話がある よければ ゆっくり…

translation.en: She's busy.
Ranger.
Eyes front, Pentecost.
- Oh! Come on, Renata, not the face! - Sorry, man.
translation.ja: レナータ　顔はよせ ごめんね

translation.en: Raise you two shower chits.
translation.ja: シャワー･コインを ２つ賭ける

translation.en: Fold, Ilya. You need all the showers you can get, man.
translation.ja: イリヤ 臭いぞ シャワー浴びろ

translation.en: I have a musk! What you smell is musk.
translation.ja: 臭くない 香水つけてるんだ

translation.en: Ranger on deck!
Audio system deactivated.
translation.ja: オーディオ機能 停止

translation.en: Cadets, this is Amara Namani.
translation.ja: 訓練生 彼女はナマーニ シム訓練に参加する

translation.en: She'll be joining you in sim training bright and early.
translation.ja: 彼女はナマーニ シム訓練に参加する

translation.en: And this is Ranger Pentecost.
translation.ja: レンジャー･ ペントコストは⸺

translation.en: He will be helping me instruct you until I can find a new co- pilot to replace Ranger Burke.
translation.ja: 俺の相棒が見つかるまで 一緒に教官をつとめる

translation.en: Anything you'd like to add?
Nothing you wanna hear.
Malikova, get Namani squared away and prepped for training.
translation.ja: マラコーヴァ ナマーニに準備させろ

translation.en: Yes, sir!
As you were.
Pentecost.
We're gonna be trained by a Pentecost!
So? Not like he was the one who died helping close the Breach.
translation.ja: 裂け目を閉じた英雄とは 大違いよ

translation.en: He's never even been in combat.
Uh, hey. So where should I...
Heard you built your own little Jaeger.
translation.ja: イェーガーを造ったって？

translation.en: Actually. Scrapper.
translation.ja: スクラッパーっていうの

translation.en: I operated her, too, with this solo bay...
You want to put junk together, be a mechanic. Moyulan is for pilots.
translation.ja: ガラクタいじりするなら 技師になりな

translation.en: Hey, come on. I got ya.
- Thanks. - Yeah.
Jinhai. Ou- yang Jinhai. So you and Vik already buddies, huh?
translation.ja: 俺はジナイ ヴィクとは もう友達だな

translation.en: - Vik? - It's short for Viktoria.
translation.ja: ヴィク？ ヴィクトリアと呼ぶと怒る

translation.en: But you don't want to call her that.
translation.ja: ヴィクトリアと呼ぶと怒る

translation.en: Yeah. What's her problem?
Took her three shots to pass the entrance test.
translation.ja: 入隊試験を２回 落ちた

translation.en: Yeah. Don't think she likes how you landed here.
translation.ja: 君を やっかんでる

translation.en: It's not my fault. Recruiters never come around back home.
translation.ja: 私は来たくて 来たわけじゃない

translation.en: Hey, know any Russian?
No.
I'll teach you some. Calms her down.
translation.ja: 教えてやる 彼女はロシア人だ

translation.en: Come on. Let's get you squared away.
Hemispheres out of alignment. Warning.
translation.ja: シンクロが乱れました 危険です

translation.en: We need to reconnect!
I know! I'm trying!
MAGLEV deactivated.
translation.ja: マグレヴ 作動停止

translation.en: I just can't get this.
That sucked.
Drift simulation terminated.
translation.ja: ドリフト･シミュレーション 終了

translation.en: You know, when I heard you gave November Ajax a run for his money...
translation.ja: エイジャックスを 手こずらせたと聞いて⸺ 〝失敗 〞 エイジャックスを 手こずらせたと聞いて⸺

translation.en: I thought we might have something here. - - Now, I'm not so sure.
translation.ja: 楽しみにしていたが 期待外れかな

translation.en: How am I supposed to drift in this thing? It smells like feet.
translation.ja: ドリフトできないわ 足の臭いがする

translation.en: I didn't ask for your excuses, Cadet.
You putting her up against Kaiju that almost killed veteran pilots, doesn't make any sense.
translation.ja: 小娘を怪獣と 戦わせるなんて無理だ

translation.en: Maybe she's not the only one that doesn't belong here.
translation.ja: そう言う自分は どうだ？

translation.en: Wow.
See, Nate, I know you have a problem with me. But come on. She's just a kid.
translation.ja: 俺を嫌うのはいいが あいつは まだガキだ

translation.en: So were we. That's the point.
translation.ja: 我々は みんなそうだった

translation.en: You make stronger connections when you're young. And that kind of bond makes for a better drift pilot.
translation.ja: 若いから神経接続が強く いいパイロットになれる

translation.en: Yeah. I remember the pitch. Thanks.
translation.ja: その宣伝文句は よく覚えてるよ

translation.en: Ryoichi, Renata, you're up. Show our new recruit how it's done.
translation.ja: リョーイチ　レナータ 新入りに見本を見せろ

translation.en: What the hell are you wearing?
Jules loves it. Yeah, she told me it's nice to finally have someone with style around here.
translation.ja: ジュールスは オシャレだと 気に入ってくれた

translation.en: Can't blame the girl. I'm sexy.
translation.ja: 俺はセクシーだからな

translation.en: - Hmm. Yeah. - Want a drink?
Sure.
Thanks. Ice cream's up top.
translation.ja: ありがとう アイスクリームは上だ

translation.en: Yes.
So one more time around, huh? To prove your old man wrong?
translation.ja: 戻ったのは 父親を見返すためか？

translation.en: Nah, I just came back to see if your chin implant ever settled in.
translation.ja: お前のアゴの詰め物は？

translation.en: Well, I think it's settled in quite nicely.
Yeah. It's very commanding. Kids must love it.
translation.ja: 偉そうな顔になったな

translation.en: - Jake, these kids, they look up to us. - Mmm- hmm.
translation.ja: ジェイク 俺たちは訓練生の手本だ

translation.en: We gotta show them that we can work together.
translation.ja: いがみ合ってちゃダメだ

translation.en: Well, the war ended 10 years ago, man. You just need to let that go. Just, woosah.
translation.ja: 戦争は10年前に終わった そうリキむなよ

translation.en: You have to understand your enemy's...
- You have... -
Sorry, mate.
You have to understand your enemy's objective to know you've defeated them. We still don't.
translation.ja: 敵を倒すには まず 敵の狙いを知らないと

translation.en: No. I can help you out with that.
translation.ja: 敵の狙いなら分かるさ

translation.en: See, I'm thinking it has something to do with them sending giant monsters to kick the crap out of us.
translation.ja: 俺たちを滅ぼすため 怪獣を送り込んだんだ

translation.en: No, no, no. The Precursors wouldn't send Kaiju to flatten a few cities if they were trying to wipe us all out.
translation.ja: 人類を滅ぼすのが目的なら 他の手を使う

translation.en: All right, look, Nate, I don't have a problem with you, man.
translation.ja: 俺は お前を嫌ってない

translation.en: But I had to make a choice. It was between your pretty face and prison. I chose your pretty face.
translation.ja: だから刑務所よりも お前のカワイイ顔を選んだ

translation.en: Oh, well, I'm touched. How many damn toppings do you need?
translation.ja: うれしいよ まだトッピングを？

translation.en: Leave my toppings be, man. Don't mess with my damn toppings.
translation.ja: 俺の自由だ　口出しするな

translation.en: So the cadets got like, what, a couple of months before they graduate?
translation.ja: 訓練生は 卒業まで あと２か月？

translation.en: - Six. - Okay.
translation.ja: ６か月だ じゃ お前が⸺

translation.en: I tell you what.
Every time you want to say something soldiery to them, I'll just nod.
translation.ja: 兵士っぽいことを言うたび 俺は うなずく

translation.en: Or like, Yep, what he said.
translation.ja: 兵士っぽいことを言うたび 俺は うなずく 訓練生はパイロットになり 俺は元の生活に

translation.en: Then before you know it, they get to be pilots.
translation.ja: 訓練生はパイロットになり 俺は元の生活に

translation.en: - I get to get back to my life. - Great.
translation.ja: 訓練生はパイロットになり 俺は元の生活に よし

translation.en: Boom.
It may happen sooner than you think.
How so?
Big dog and pony show tomorrow. Shao and her team are presenting this new drone program they have.
translation.ja: 明日 シャオ産業が 新型の無人機を披露する

translation.en: Could make us all obsolete.
Sounds like my get- out- of- jail- free card.
You know, you can front all you want,
but you and I both know you could've been great.
translation.ja: 偉大な兵士になれるのに

translation.en: Ms. Shao. Marshal Quan.
translation.ja: 〈シャオ社長 チュアン司令官です〉

translation.en: It's an honor to meet you.
Sorry. She doesn't do the whole hand shaking thing.
translation.ja: 社長は握手をしない主義で

translation.en: Dr. Newton Geiszler. Head of research and development for Shao Industries.
translation.ja: 私は研究主任の ニュートン･ガイズラー

translation.en: - That's a nice firm grip you got there. -
translation.ja: あなたは握力が強いですね

translation.en: Hand hard very shake.
Gratitude for having us.
Ranger Lambert and I will get you set up ma'am.
That's a much better look on you.
Guess it's better than prison stripes. Barely.
I'm sorry, is this him? It's gotta be him, right?
translation.ja: もしかして 彼がスタッカーの息子？

translation.en: You're Stacker's kid. Hey, I'm Newt. I was a big fan of your father's.
translation.ja: 僕はニュート お父さんの大ファンだ

translation.en: Amazing speech writer, by the way. Did you ever hear his one where he canceled the apocalypse?
translation.ja: お父さんの 最後のスピーチは…

translation.en: Newton!
- Hermann... - I was hoping you'd be tagging along.
translation.ja: ハーマン よく来てくれた 実験を手伝ってくれ

translation.en: I could use your help on an experiment I'm working on.
translation.ja: よく来てくれた 実験を手伝ってくれ

translation.en: Now, this will only take a moment. I know how busy you are.
translation.ja: すぐ終わる　君も忙しいだろ

translation.en: - Yeah. - Don't want to impose, but...
Ah, come on, you can't impose on me.
translation.ja: 遠慮しなくていいんだ

translation.en: I mean, we've been inside each other's heads, right? We've saved the world!
translation.ja: 互いの頭に入り 世界を救った仲だ

translation.en: We've drifted with a Kaiju!
If we hadn't yanked that intel out of that Kaiju's brain, Raleigh would've never been able to close the Breach.
translation.ja: そのおかげで 裂け目を閉じられたんだ

translation.en: Now that was you! And that was me!
Technically more me, but any chance we could make this quick, or...
translation.ja: 主に僕の手柄だが… 話って？

translation.en: Um... Deployment.
- Huh? - Of Jaegers.
Deploying them into battle, it takes too much time. The amount of damage a Kaiju can inflict before they've...
translation.ja: 配備に時間がかかると 怪獣に攻撃され…

translation.en: Ah, here. I think I've found a solution.
translation.ja: これだ 解決策を考えた

translation.en: Hermann, you know I can never read your...
Rocket thrusters, huh?
Yeah. No.
translation.ja: そうか　これじゃダメだ

translation.en: No. There's no fuel in the world with that kind of boost- to- mass ratio.
translation.ja: このパワーを 出せる燃料はない

translation.en: From this world.
No.
Is that Kaiju blood?
Exactly!
I've discovered Kaiju blood is highly reactive
translation.ja: 私は発見したんだ 怪獣の血に⸺

translation.en: when it's combined with rare earth elements. Cerium, lanthanum, gadolinium.
translation.ja: レアアースの要素を 混合すれば…

translation.en: I realize that, pal. Okay. You can't be fooling around with this stuff. You're gonna blow yourself up.
translation.ja: そんなのをいじってると 爆発してしまうぞ

translation.en: Now, no one knows more about Kaiju morphology than you!
translation.ja: 君は怪獣の形態学に詳しい

translation.en: If you could just take a look, please.
No, Hermann, I gotta stop you. Look, none of this matters.
translation.ja: やめてくれ こんなことは無駄だ

translation.en: Once my boss's drones are approved, deployment time, that's gonna be a non- issue.
translation.ja: 社長の無人機が 承認されれば⸺

translation.en: Within a year, buddy, we're gonna have drones everywhere.
translation.ja: １年以内に 世界各地に配備される

translation.en: So you won't help me?
Look, why don't we talk about it over dinner at my place?
Okay? You can finally meet Alice.
I don't need a hot meal, Newton. What I need is a solution to a very specific problem.
translation.ja: そんな暇はない 問題を解決しないと

translation.en: Ah, that's me, bud. I'm sorry. Duty calls. It's been nice catching up.
translation.ja: 悪いけど仕事だ 再会できて よかった

translation.en: Newton.
I, um...
I still get nightmares
about what we saw when we drifted with that disgusting Kaiju brain.
translation.ja: 怪獣の脳に入って 見たものが夢に出る

translation.en: Yeah.
But it was a hell of a rush, wasn't it?
Dr. Geiszler. Time to go.
translation.ja: 〈ガイズラー博士　時間だ〉

translation.en: Okay, okay.
You and Dr. Gottlieb were close, weren't you? During the war?
translation.ja: 〈ゴットリーブ博士とは 親しいのね〉

translation.en: We shared lab yes okay...
Speak English. Your Mandarin makes you sound like an idiot.
translation.ja: 〈英語で話して 中国語の発音が ひどい〉

translation.en: I know, I'm terrible. Uh, yes, we shared a lab together.
What were you and Dr. Gottlieb talking about?
Some crazy idea he had about thruster pods on a Jaeger.
translation.ja: イェーガーの推進機の件を…

translation.en: Until Secretary General Mori makes her recommendation at the Council Summit, I can't afford a misstep.
translation.ja: 〈森事務局長の推薦が 出るまでヘマは禁物よ〉

translation.en: No more contact with him...
until after the vote.
The man's completely harmless.
- - Uh, okay.
Could you say that again and this time about 80% slower?
translation.ja: 今のを80％ゆっくりと 言って下さい

translation.en: I said, don't make me question your loyalty. Understand?
translation.ja: 忠誠心を 私に疑われないように

translation.en: What's to question?
- I barely talk to the guy anyway. -
Then it won't be a problem.
And work on your Mandarin. I don't like to repeat myself.
translation.ja: 〈中国語を もっと練習して〉

translation.en: In any language.
My drones are the next step in Jaeger evolution.
translation.ja: 私の無人機は 次世代のイェーガー

translation.en: The system I designed processes commands through a quantum data core.
translation.ja: 量子データ･コアから 指令を伝達でき⸺

translation.en: This means that a single pilot can operate the drone remotely from anywhere in the world.
translation.ja: 世界のどこからでも たった１人で遠隔操作できる

translation.en: As soon as the council approves deployment based on Secretary General Mori's final report,
translation.ja: 森事務局長の推薦で 評議会が承認すれば⸺

translation.en: the days of struggling to find and train drift compatible pilots will be a thing of the past.
translation.ja: パイロットの適合性も 問題にならなくなります

translation.en: And you think a bunch of desk jockeys are better than us?
We are not here to shut you down.
Cooperation between our programs has never been more vital.
translation.ja: 協力していくことが重要です

translation.en: If there are any questions.
We are pilots. Not a bunch of office workers!
And now we're shouting. There's no need to shout.
That was slick. So how long until all this is shut down, so I can go home?
translation.ja: いつ ここが閉鎖になり 俺は帰れる？

translation.en: I don't trust the tech. Not yet at least.
translation.ja: 無人機は まだ信用できない

translation.en: It looks pretty good to me.
Remote systems can be hacked or compromised.
translation.ja: 遠隔システムは ハッキングの恐れが

translation.en: No, you've got the key vote, right? So there you go. It's your decision.
translation.ja: 心配なら姉さんは 反対すればいい

translation.en: I wish I could just go ahead and approve them.
Nearly half the council is backing Liwen. They aren't going to like my decision.
translation.ja: 評議会の半数が賛成だし 反対すれば非難される

translation.en: Who cares what they like and what they don't like?
translation.ja: そんなこと気にするな

translation.en: I tell you what, I'm gonna go with you. For moral support. Plus I wanna get out of this place.
translation.ja: 評議会に同行してやる 外に出たいしな

translation.en: I'm glad you offered
because I already requested Gipsy Avenger as honor guard at the Council Summit.
translation.ja: ジプシー･アベンジャーを 最高評議会の警護役にした

translation.en: You know Gipsy's Nate's ride.
His co- pilot works for Liwen now. He needs a new one.
translation.ja: 彼の相棒は シャオ産業に雇われた

translation.en: One that you already know is drift compatible.
All right. I'll do it. I got your back.
translation.ja: 分かったよ 俺が あいつと乗る

translation.en: But I wanna be there when you tell Nate because I just wanna see his face. He's gonna be so pissed.
translation.ja: 相棒が俺だと知った あいつの顔が見たい

translation.en: He's just gonna stand there like,
Yeah, I don't think you belong in a Jaeger, Jake. Get out of my Jaeger.
translation.ja: “お前はイェーガーに 乗る資格はない”

translation.en: I'm handsome and sexy.
He is handsome. He is sexy.
Thank you, Jake.
Welcome back. Lots of sunshine today to kick off our weekend.
translation.ja: この週末は いい天気になりました この週末は いい天気になりました 環太平洋防衛軍 最高評議会

translation.en: Good afternoon, everyone.
translation.ja: 環太平洋防衛軍 最高評議会 シドニーの⸺ 環太平洋防衛軍 最高評議会

translation.en: Peter Overton broadcasting from the Nine Studios in Sydney...
translation.ja: 〝無人機反対デモが 暴徒化 〞 スタジオから 生放送です

translation.en: So far, police say at least 49 officers injured.
translation.ja: これまでに49人の 警官が負傷

translation.en: Kaiju worshipers in black masks throwing bottles and rocks.
translation.ja: 怪獣崇拝者が 警備隊に 投石しています

translation.en: PPDC Security in riot gear are attempting to...
translation.ja: 警備隊に 投石しています 〝イェーガー輸送機が 評議会場に到着 〞 警備隊に 投石しています

translation.en: Gipsy Avenger, this is Marshal Quan.
translation.ja: ジプシー･アベンジャー チュアン司令官だ

translation.en: All you have to do is stand there and look pretty.
translation.ja: おとなしく立っていればいい

translation.en: Stay focused, try not to fall over.
- Roger that, sir. - Go for drop.
In three, two, one. Drop!
Jake!
Drift alignment unstable.
Relax. It's coming back to me.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　じき勘が戻る

translation.en: - You sure? - Ion cells activated.
translation.ja: 本当か？ つながってる間は ジュールスのことを考えるな

translation.en: We're in each other's heads, remember? So I'd appreciate it if you'd stop thinking about Jules.
translation.ja: つながってる間は ジュールスのことを考えるな

translation.en: Not gonna happen.
How about you stop thinking about kicking my ass? - Not gonna happen either. -
translation.ja: 俺を蹴ることも考えるな それも無理だ

translation.en: - Gonna be a long day. -
Hemispheres are calibrated, sir.
Neural handshake is weak, but holding.
Incoming transport.
- Warning. - Gipsy to Command. You reading this?
translation.ja: 司令部　奇妙な反応が

translation.en: Gipsy, this is Command.
Be advised. We have a rogue Jaeger.
translation.ja: 正体不明のイェーガー出現

translation.en: Pilots of unregistered Jaeger,
power down and exit your Conn- Pod immediately.
translation.ja: 動力を切り ポッドから出ろ

translation.en: I repeat. Power down, and exit your Conn- Pods now.
translation.ja: 繰り返す 動力を切り ポッドから出ろ

translation.en: Missiles fired!
- Low power warning. - We're losing power!
Jake! That Jaeger's power reading is...
translation.ja: ジェイク あのイェーガーは…

translation.en: It's jamming our comms!
- Nate! - Power's up!
translation.ja: ネイト！ 動力が回復

translation.en: Oh, shit.
- What do we do? - Follow my lead!
translation.ja: どうする？ 俺に合わせろ

translation.en: Mako's hit!
She's going down! We've gotta move!
Activating gravity sling!
Mayday! Mayday! Mayday! This is Mike, Mike, Charlie, 0- 5- 2.
translation.ja: メイデー メイデー こちらMMC-052！

translation.en: We have been hit, and we are going down!
Sending.
Mako!
Jake! Wait!
Drift alignment failing.
Come on, Sarah! Do something!
translation.ja: サラ　何とかしてよ

translation.en: - Drift alignment failing. - You stupid brain thing!
So, I'm not really good at emotional stuff, but...
translation.ja: 人を慰めるのは うまくできないけど⸺

translation.en: I really am sorry about your sister.
Half- sister?
Yeah, her family died during the Onibaba attack.
translation.ja: 彼女の家族は 怪獣に殺され⸺

translation.en: My dad took her in.
She was my sister. My family.
translation.ja: だから姉だ 家族だ

translation.en: Why are you out of uniform?
Just had a lot on my mind after Sydney.
translation.ja: シドニーの後で考えた

translation.en: I guess I just wanted to be comfortable.
Well, don't let Ranger Lambert see you in that. He might take the stick out of his butt and beat you with it.
translation.ja: ランバートに見られたら 大目玉くらうわよ

translation.en: I think I'm safe. It's wedged in there pretty tight.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　奴は目が小さい

translation.en: So they're still using Sarah.
translation.ja: まだサラを使ってるのか

translation.en: Yeah. And I can't drift with her for some reason.
translation.ja: そうよ なぜかドリフトできない

translation.en: All the other cadets have been training for years, and I just...
translation.ja: 他の訓練生は ちゃんとできるのに…

translation.en: I hate feeling like the slow kid.
You gotta relax. Or you're just grinding gears. I'll help you out.
translation.ja: くよくよするな 一緒にやってやる

translation.en: - Got it, Coach. - Don't call me Coach.
translation.ja: お願い コーチ コーチはよせ

translation.en: All right, Sensei.
Concentrate.
We have to make a good connection. You can't do that if you're yappin' your gums.
translation.ja: 神経を接続するには おしゃべりは禁物だ

translation.en: You ready?
Ready.
All right.
Let's see if we're drift compatible.
Neural load exceeding limit.
Stay focused, Amara.
translation.ja: 集中しろ アマーラ

translation.en: Remember, the stronger your connection, the better you fight.
translation.ja: 接続が強いほど より うまく戦える

translation.en: That's it.
Amara! Come on, jump! Jump to me, baby!
translation.ja: アマーラ 跳ぶんだ！

translation.en: You have to, Amara, come on! Jump!
Amara! Don't hang on to the memory.
translation.ja: アマーラ 記憶にこだわって 立ち止まるな

translation.en: Just let it flow right through you. Amara!
translation.ja: 記憶にこだわって 立ち止まるな アマーラ！

translation.en: Amara! Jump in there!
Yeah, come on. Get together. Ready? One, two...
- Cheese! -
Got it. Wanna see?
Wait a sec.
Amara. Amara, you need to let it go. Amara!
translation.ja: アマーラ　過去は忘れろ アマーラ

translation.en: Look, just listen to my voice!
Amara!
- Amara! - Daddy! Daddy!
Amara! Come on, jump!
translation.ja: アマーラ！ 跳ぶんだ

translation.en: - Amara! We need to break the drift! - Jump to me! Come on!
translation.ja: ドリフトを中断しろ こっちに跳べ！

translation.en: I'm scared!
Baby, I will catch you! I promise. Come on!
translation.ja: 必ずキャッチしてやる

translation.en: - Amara! - Amara, come on!
translation.ja: アマーラ！ 跳ぶのよ！

translation.en: Jump!
Amara! Take it off!
Are you okay?
I was there.
I felt it.
I felt it, too.
Jake, it's me. Are you there?
Yeah, I'm here.
Meet me in the lab right away. Marshal wants to see us.
All right. On my way.
You okay?
What is it?  A message. From Mako.
translation.ja: 何です？ マコからのメッセージだ

translation.en: She was trying to send it from her copter right before it went down.
translation.ja: 墜落の直前に 送ろうとしていた

translation.en: It's a data package. High density.
Obsidian Fury was jamming comms. How could her signal get through?
translation.ja: 通信妨害されてたのに 送信を？

translation.en: It didn't. At least not intact.
So it's gone?
Gone is relative in the digital realm.
By running a modified fractal algorithm, I might be able to reconstruct a few megabytes.
translation.ja: 断片だけでも 復元できるかもしれない

translation.en: There.
Is that a Kaiju?
I'm checking against PPDC Kaiju archives.
translation.ja: 防衛軍の怪獣データで 照会する

translation.en: No match against the database.
Keep looking. Whatever this is, it was important to her. I want to know why.
translation.ja: 調べるんだ 重要なものに違いない

translation.en: And I want to know who was piloting that rogue Jaeger.
translation.ja: あのイェーガーに 誰が乗っていたかも

translation.en: Hey.  Sorry I'm late. - I thought you were still in Sydney. -
translation.ja: 遅れて すみません まだシドニーかと…

translation.en: The council has approved Drone deployment in an emergency session.
translation.ja: 〈評議会が 無人機を承認した〉

translation.en: That's great.
Thought you'd be a little more enthusiastic, doc.
translation.ja: あまり喜んでいないな

translation.en: Yeah, no, I'm pumped. This is great.
translation.ja: とても うれしいですよ でもシドニー襲撃の 直後とは…

translation.en: It's just the timing of everything with the attack and all, feels a little...
translation.ja: でもシドニー襲撃の 直後とは…

translation.en: I was there. I know what happened.
And it wouldn't have...
If our Drones had been in the field.
Neural connection terminated.
Now everyone sees that.
- Yeah. Uh, I guess they do. -
translation.ja: ええ そうでしょうね

translation.en: Which means the attack was positive... all things considered.
translation.ja: 〈あの襲撃は 我が社にプラスだった〉

translation.en: If you look at it sideways, and you squint, then maybe you could say that. Uh...
translation.ja: ゆがんだ見方をすれば そうかも

translation.en: - I'm sorry, what is going on here? -
The council expects full deployment in 48 hours.
- Forty- eight is a... -
I've worked my whole life for this.
Get it done.
Okay. Yeah. Not a problem. - That'll be fine. -
translation.ja: はい　問題ありません

translation.en: 48 hours?
No way we'll be ready.
You don't think there's a way? All right, well, then you're fired.
translation.ja: できないのか？ それならクビだ

translation.en: Okay? How about that?
Or maybe you're promoted. I don't know. We'll see how it goes. Just get it done!
translation.ja: うまくできれば昇進だぞ やるんだ！

translation.en: Give me this.
Hey, honey. I'm home.
Sorry I'm late. God, things were...
translation.ja: 遅くなって ごめんよ

translation.en: Things were crazy today with what happened in Sydney.
translation.ja: シドニーの件で大変だった

translation.en: All those people, it was not pretty.
translation.ja: 大勢の人が ひどいことに

translation.en: My boss almost got killed. That could've been bad.
translation.ja: 僕のボスも殺されかけた

translation.en: Maybe. I guess, I don't know.
translation.ja: その方が よかったか？

translation.en: That would've been great actually, that one is all over me.
translation.ja: 僕にムチャなことを 言ってくるからね

translation.en: I mean, I can't get a break from her! I'm ranting. Enough about work.
translation.ja: ガミガミ言われて うんざりだ

translation.en: And enough about her, really, I should be focused on you.
translation.ja: 彼女は忘れ 君と２人で⸺

translation.en: How about we have a little fun in the bedroom?
translation.ja: ベッドルームで楽しもう

translation.en: How was your day?
translation.ja: 今日は どうだった？ 〝アリス 〞

translation.en: Oh, that's great. Yeah, that's exciting.
translation.ja: そうか よかった 〝アリス 〞 それは面白いね

translation.en: What's that?
A little pick- me- up?
Well,  what can I say?
translation.ja: そうか 君は 僕の⸺

translation.en: You read my mind.
They're calling it Obsidian Fury. There's never been a rogue like this.
translation.ja: 暴走イェーガーは オブシディアン･フューリー？

translation.en: News feed said they were posting a dozen Jaegers at the memorial.
translation.ja: 追悼式にイェーガーが12機

translation.en: When I die, I want that many to send me off.
translation.ja: 俺が死んでも追悼式を？

translation.en: Your pop's gonna make you work with boobs when you wash out.
translation.ja: あんたは落第して 父親の手伝い

translation.en: Jaegers do not show up when the boob guy dies.
Wait, your dad works with boobs?
He's a plastic surgeon. He doesn't just work with...
I'm not gonna wash out. I'm gonna be a pilot.
translation.ja: 俺は落第なんかしない

translation.en: Still. You die, meh, I post one Jaeger at your funeral.
translation.ja: 死んだら イェーガーを１機 供える

translation.en: - - Maybe half a Jaeger.
I heard that's where they found Amara. In half a Jaeger.
translation.ja: アマーラのイェーガーは ミニサイズ

translation.en: It was a whole Jaeger.
It just wasn't very big... Viktoria.
translation.ja: 巨大じゃないだけだよ ヴィクトリア

translation.en: Bigger is better.
Kiss my ass.
What did you say?
Kiss my ass.
- Am I saying that right? - Yep.
I worked every day of my life to be here. You didn't do anything. You were just picked up off the street, like garbage!
translation.ja: 私は人生を懸けてる 道で拾われた あんたと違う

translation.en: You know where I learned that? On the streets, you big, dumb...
translation.ja: 私は これを路上で学んだ

translation.en: Ranger on deck!
- She jumped me! - She doesn't belong here!
translation.ja: 彼女が先に 出て行け！

translation.en: I don't care!
You know, when I first joined the Corps, I was just like you.
translation.ja: 俺も⸺ 入隊当初は同じだった

translation.en: Worse. I was nobody.
translation.ja: もっと ひどいチンピラだった

translation.en: But that woman we laid to rest today, Mako Mori,
translation.ja: だが今日 埋葬された 森マコは⸺

translation.en: she said, Whoever you are, the minute you enter this program, you join a family.
translation.ja: “入隊した者は家族だ”と 教えてくれた

translation.en: And no matter what they do, no matter how stupid they may act sometimes,
translation.ja: “時には仲間がバカなことを するかもしれないが⸺”

translation.en: you forgive 'em, and you move on.
So you start believing that. In here.
translation.ja: ここにいるなら その言葉を信じろ

translation.en: And you'll start believing it in a Jaeger.
translation.ja: イェーガーに乗る時も

translation.en: Marshal's looking for you guys. Says Gottlieb found something.
translation.ja: 司令官が呼んでるわ 何か分かったとか

translation.en: It isn't something. It's somewhere.
translation.ja: これは物ではなく 場所を示してる

translation.en: Severnaya Zemlya. Off Siberia's Taymyr Peninsula.
translation.ja: シベリア タイミル半島の セヴェルナヤ･ゼムリャ

translation.en: - What's in Zemlya? - Well, nothing anymore.
translation.ja: そこに何が？ 今は何もない

translation.en: A facility roughly in this location was used to manufacture Jaeger power cores earlier in the war,
translation.ja: イェーガーの動力コア工場が 戦時中にあったが⸺

translation.en: but it was decommissioned years ago.
Why would Mako be trying to tell us about an abandoned factory in the middle of nowhere?
translation.ja: なぜマコは工場跡のことを メッセージで送った？

translation.en: Sir, permission to take Gipsy Avenger to see what the hell's out there.
translation.ja: 司令官 ジプシーで そこに行かせて下さい

translation.en: Scanning.
Looks like Mako's message was a dead end.
This place is abandoned.
No, wait a second.
I'm getting some weird readings.
- - Incoming!
Take out his legs!
- - We gotta get out of here!
Plasma cannon!
I think we pissed him off.
Good.
You remember our old move?
Hell yeah.
He looks hurt!
Go for his power core!
Pilots of Obsidian Fury,
translation.ja: フューリーのパイロット

translation.en: get the hell out of your Conn- Pod.
What the hell is that?
It's definitely Kaiju.
A secondary brain used to control the hindquarters.
translation.ja: 後半身を動かす第２の脳

translation.en: How'd they get into our world?
There hasn't been a breach in 10 years. Sensors would've picked it up.
translation.ja: 裂け目からは 10年 現れてない

translation.en: I don't think there was a breach.
translation.ja: 裂け目から来た怪獣なら⸺

translation.en: Kaiju flesh has a distinct radioactive half- life signature.
translation.ja: 裂け目から来た怪獣なら⸺ 異次元(アンティヴァース)に特有の 放射線を発してます

translation.en: Particular to the Anteverse.
translation.ja: 異次元(アンティヴァース)に特有の 放射線を発してます

translation.en: This specimen does not.
translation.ja: しかし これは違う

translation.en: Okay, so, you're saying that it's from our universe?
translation.ja: 異次元から来たんじゃない？

translation.en: The genetic fingerprints indicate distinctly terrestrial modification techniques,
translation.ja: 遺伝子の痕跡によれば 地球で手が加えられてる

translation.en: probably engineered from Kaiju flesh left over from the war.
translation.ja: 戦争で死んだ怪獣を 使ったんでしょう

translation.en: Precursors didn't do this.
translation.ja: プリカーサーではないな

translation.en: Humans did.
Oh, my God. That hunk of slimy crap was piloting Obsidian Fury?
translation.ja: グチャッとした肉塊が 操ってたとはね

translation.en: - We gotta get a look inside. - Inside?
translation.ja: 中を見なきゃ 中を？

translation.en: That thing's part Kaiju.
Come on, guys. When are we ever gonna get a chance to see something like this again?
translation.ja: こんなのを見るチャンスは 二度とない

translation.en: Never. Never would be good.
You guys can stay here. I'm going.
translation.ja: じゃ ここにいて 私は行く

translation.en: No. Amar... Amara!
Guys, guys, we should not be in here.
translation.ja: ここに入ったら まずい

translation.en: It's fused all the way through the system.
translation.ja: システムに絡みついてる

translation.en: Like... Muscle tissue.
translation.ja: まるで⸺ 筋肉みたい

translation.en: That's how it was able to move like it did. Cool.
translation.ja: だから筋肉が あるみたいに動いた

translation.en: Yeah, cool.
Working with boobs is sounding better and better.
translation.ja: オッパイいじりの方が いいかも

translation.en: Shine your light over here.
Oh. Yeah, let's just go yank on the guts of the weird- ass Kaiju killbot.
translation.ja: 怪獣ロボットの内臓を 引っ張って大丈夫？

translation.en: What is it?
- I think it's some sort of... -
Jinhai!
- I told you not to yank on those. - Go get help! Go!
translation.ja: 引っ張るから… 早く助けを！

translation.en: Man, we are so screwed!
Is Jinhai okay?
He's got some scarring, but, yeah, he'll live.
Marshal put him on probation. Meilin and Suresh, too. They blink wrong, all of 'em are out.
translation.ja: 彼は謹慎処分だ メイリンとスレシュもな

translation.en: No, it's not their fault. I talked them into it.
translation.ja: 彼らは悪くない 私が…

translation.en: I'm sorry, I tried to talk to the Marshal, but you're dismissed from the program.
translation.ja: 司令官と話したが お前は追放だ

translation.en: Never belonged here anyway.
Really?
You know, I used to say the same thing a long time ago.
translation.ja: 俺も昔 そう言った

translation.en: But I actually didn't wanna be here.
translation.ja: 本当は⸺ ここにいたくなかっただけ

translation.en: Still don't.
translation.ja: ここにいたくなかっただけ

translation.en: Why'd you sign up?
We were at war.
And my dad was leading the charge, and I thought maybe I could see more of him.
translation.ja: 入隊すれば親父と 会う機会が増えるし⸺

translation.en: Maybe even drift with him.
Well, one night, me and Nate got into it. It was over something stupid. I can't even remember what.
translation.ja: ある夜 ネイトと ケンカになった俺は⸺

translation.en: So, I climbed in an old Mark IV, just to show him I didn't need him to be a great pilot.
translation.ja: １人で第４世代機を動かし 見返そうとした

translation.en: - That's pretty dumb. - Yeah.
translation.ja: バカみたい そうだな

translation.en: How far did you get?
About seven steps. Take or leave.
How far did you get?
About two steps, and I blacked out from the strain.
And the first thing I saw when I woke up was my dad, just standing right in front of me, looking stern.
translation.ja: 目覚めたら親父が 怖い顔して立ってた

translation.en: What did he say?
He said I was out of the program. He said I didn't deserve to be in a Jaeger. Look, he said a lot of things.
translation.ja: 俺は追放だとか パイロット失格だとか…

translation.en: A year later, my dad was gone.
And I didn't get a chance to prove him wrong. More importantly, I didn’t get a chance to prove it to myself.
translation.ja: 親父を見返せず 自分でも納得できないままだ

translation.en: You listen to me.
Don't let what other people think of you define who you are.
translation.ja: 自分が何者か決めるのは⸺

translation.en: You won't like where that takes you. Do you understand?
translation.ja: 自分自身だ　分かるか

translation.en: And keep your head up.
And you might just be as good- looking as me in this type of situation. - - Seriously.
translation.ja: 逆境でも俺みたいに 魅力的でいろ

translation.en: This face is set up well. Beauty is a burden.
translation.ja: 俺のような いい男は 美貌(びぼう)が重荷だ

translation.en: You'll be all right.
Shao Industries.
What?
Obsidian Fury has tech in it made by Shao Industries.
translation.ja: フューリーはシャオ産業の 技術を使ってる

translation.en: That's impossible.
Jules and her team scanned every centimeter of that Jaeger.
Insulating meta materials wound counter- clockwise in the shunt cabling.
translation.ja: 絶縁材の巻き方が 反時計回りだった

translation.en: Shao's the only company that winds them that way.
translation.ja: シャオ産業だけの巻き方よ

translation.en: Amara, are you sure about what you're telling me right now?
Yes.
Yeah. I stole a ton to make Scrapper.
I thought it might be important.
Yeah. Thank you.
Shao Industries? They don't even have a bio- division.
translation.ja: シャオ産業は バイオ部門もないのに

translation.en: Yeah, not that we know of.
Cabling could have been stolen, just like in Amara's Jaeger. We're gonna need more than that to connect Fury to Shao.
translation.ja: 盗んだ部品を使ったのかも もっと関連を調べないと

translation.en: What about Newt?
He'd have access to the internal records, the shipping manifests.
translation.ja: 内部の情報に アクセスできる

translation.en: All right, go see him. Keep a low profile.
translation.ja: 彼に会いに行け 目立つなよ

translation.en: I have a mission? Finally!
translation.ja: やっと任務をもらえた

translation.en: We'll take what we know to the Marshal.
The building's secure, ma'am.
No visitors without the proper credentials.
I don't want anyone interfering with deployment.
What is it?
I'll be in my office.
Okay.
This isn't fair.
I'm sorry. You don't deserve this.
It was my fault.
This is on me.
Amara.
The next Jaeger you build,
translation.ja: 次に造るイェーガーは⸺

translation.en: make it a big one.
System online.
- And we have delivery at 100%, people. - System online.
translation.ja: これで無人機の輸送は 100％完了した

translation.en: A hundred percent! That's the way that it's done, okay?
I told you we could do it, and we did it!  Malfunction.
I'm losing uplink to drone 375!
Why? Why?
Figure out why!
We'll take what we know to the council in person.
translation.ja: 評議会に直接 話す

translation.en: Prep a transport.
- Give me a second. -
The Drones in the field are malfunctioning!
Stop the ones coming in from deploying!
Get to Gipsy! Go!
All pilots, man your Jaegers and engage hostiles!
translation.ja: 全パイロット イェーガーに乗り応戦せよ

translation.en: Okay, you got this.
You cool? Yeah, super cool. Just stay calm...
translation.ja: 落ち着いて対処すれば…

translation.en: Dr. Geiszler! Shao's looking for you.
I know! I'm heading up. I'm heading right...
Hermann. What are you doing here? How'd you get in here?
translation.ja: ハーマン なぜ君が ここに？

translation.en: I do have PPDC credentials. And besides, everyone else seems a little bit preoccupied with the killer drones your boss just set off!
translation.ja: 防衛軍の使いだ この会社の無人機が暴走した

translation.en: - She used you. - No. She lured you with money and a fancy title. No. No way.
translation.ja: 君は金と肩書につられ 利用されてる

translation.en: While you were basking in the glow, she took your research and she twisted it.
translation.ja: シャオは君の研究を 間違ったことに使った

translation.en: Help me stop her, Newton. Help me save the world like old times.
translation.ja: 世界を救うため 今回も手伝ってくれ

translation.en: All right, technically, you were helping me last time. Let's get that straight.
translation.ja: 前回は君が 僕を手伝ったんだ

translation.en: Fine. Help me help you save the world.
translation.ja: 分かった 世界を救う君を 手伝わせてくれ

translation.en: - What do you say? - I say...
I say... Don't shoot!
God damn it, why can't I get this language?
- What's happening? - Amara! Are those Jaegers?
translation.ja: 何事だ？ イェーガー？

translation.en: No, they're drones from Shao Industries.
- What are they doing? - I don't know! They just went crazy!
translation.ja: なぜ攻撃を？ いきなり暴走を

translation.en: Hey! Clear the deck now!
Get back to your quarters right now!
- Yes, sir! - Go, go, go!
Go! Get the hell out of here! Come on! Go, go!
translation.ja: 早く ここから逃げろ！

translation.en: Come on. Come on, come on. Get up.
Really?
Now?
Hermann!
Little help!
Next time, why don't you learn how to use a gun? Take that!
translation.ja: 銃の撃ち方も知らないのか

translation.en: Vile, vile individual!
- Thank you, Newton. - Yeah. I'd hug you if I didn't have a rule about public displays of affection.
translation.ja: ありがとう ２人だけならハグする

translation.en: - It's fine. - To hell with it.
Okay! All right. If you're done groping me? Let's take care of the drones, right? All right, good.
translation.ja: 無人機を止めるんだろ

translation.en: Shut down all systems! Now!
Everyone, get out of the lab or I will shoot you! - I will shoot you twice! -
translation.ja: 外に出ろ 逆らうと二度 撃つぞ

translation.en: Always knew you'd go nuts!
You're officially fired! Get out!
What do we do? How do we stop this?
There's a back door, Hermann.
- To what? - To the drone subroutine.
translation.ja: 何だと？ 無人機の指令プログラム

translation.en: I added a subroutine just in case I wanna get in here and poke around down the road.
translation.ja: 万一に備え仕込んでおいた

translation.en: Oh, sneaky bastard.
I know, right?
What did you just do?
What I've been planning the last 10 years.
I'm ending the world.
Where the hell are my pilots?!
Sitrep!
Breaches detected, multiple locations! It's the Drones, sir!
All pilots, breaches detected.
Drones in the field are opening multiple breaches across the Pacific Rim!
translation.ja: 無人機が太平洋沿岸に 裂け目を開いた

translation.en: Why?
Why would you do this?
Why would I do this? Hmm.
Well...
I guess I wouldn't. Not normally, not really my style.
translation.ja: 普通なら僕は こんなことをしない

translation.en: Yeah, no, I don't know, maybe I hate you all for treating me like an insignificant, little joke of a man. Maybe that's why he did it, Hermann. I did it.
translation.ja: みんなに軽く見られたから 彼… いや 僕はやった

translation.en: See...
There you go. There's the problem.
translation.ja: 今の聞いただろ これが問題だ

translation.en: I'm just not feeling totally myself these days.
translation.ja: 最近の僕は普通じゃない

translation.en: You.
Precursors.
Very good, Hermann, you figured it out. And as usual, a step behind.
translation.ja: よく分かったな だが 今回も１歩遅い

translation.en: Newton.
- You are a good man. - No. Hermann.
- You must stop. - No, there's no point in fighting them. - You must fight back. - I'm not strong enough, Hermann.
translation.ja: やめろ　操られちゃダメだ

translation.en: - Please. You must! - I am not strong enough.
He is not strong enough!
None of you are strong enough!
translation.ja: 人間は みんな弱い！

translation.en: I'm sorry, Hermann.
They're in my head.
Let him go!
You're not going to ruin my life's work.
Oh, hey, boss.
The hell are you doing here? I told you to get to quarters!
translation.ja: 何してる　中に戻れ

translation.en: All the doors are blocked!
What do we do?
How did you do it without me knowing?
I mean, 38% of your company is fully automated.
translation.ja: この会社の38％は オートマティック機能

translation.en: It really wasn't very hard to reallocate a little over here
translation.ja: 細工するのは簡単だったよ

translation.en: and a little over there. And slip in a little Kaiju surprise without you noticing.
translation.ja: サプライズで怪獣を仕込めた

translation.en: Especially since you always thought...
you were the smartest person in the room.
In about a second, I'm going to be.
Stop! Wait, wait, wait. Newt's not in control of himself!
It isn't him! It's the Precursors. They must've infected his mind when we drifted with the Kaiju.
translation.ja: 怪獣とドリフトして 脳が何かに感染した

translation.en: Shut up!
Security, find and detain Dr. Geiszler. If he tries to resist, put a bullet in his head.
translation.ja: 〈ニュートンを捕らえて 抵抗したら撃て〉

translation.en: Stay here! We're gonna try and get to Gipsy.
translation.ja: ここにいろ　ジプシーに乗る

translation.en: You ready for this?
No! You?
- No. On three. - Great.
One, two...
Hello? Anyone there?
Gottlieb?
Jake! Thank God!
translation.ja: ジェイクか　よかった

translation.en: We're under attack. You need to force Liwen
translation.ja: 無人機を停止してくれ

translation.en: - to shut down the drones! - It isn't her.
translation.ja: リーウェンのせいじゃない

translation.en: It isn't Liwen. It was Newt.
translation.ja: リーウェンのせいじゃない ニュートが プリカーサーに⸺

translation.en: The Precursors, they've infected him.
translation.ja: ニュートが プリカーサーに⸺

translation.en: They're controlling his mind.
Gottlieb, can you get him to disable the drones?
No. He got away.
- Gottlieb, shut them down. -
I've penetrated the subroutine.
It's trying to lock you out.
Feedback loop.
Gottlieb, what the hell is going on? Gottlieb!
translation.ja: ゴットリーブ　何してる？

translation.en: Gottlieb, shut them down or we're gonna die!
Shut them down!
Yes!
Liwen has disabled the drones.
The breaches are closed. I repeat, the breaches are closed.
translation.ja: 裂け目も閉じた もう大丈夫だ

translation.en: Oh, no.
Oh, no what?
Three Kaiju have gotten through.
translation.ja: 怪獣が３体 出現した

translation.en: South Korea, Russian coast, and East China Sea.
translation.ja: 韓国とロシア沖と 東シナ海だ

translation.en: Two Cat- Fours and a Cat- Five.
Copy that.
Get back to the dome.
We're gonna need all the help we can get.
- You girls okay? - Yes, ma'am.
All right, what do we got?
The reports are still coming in, but drones took out Jaegers and Shatterdomes across the Rim.
translation.ja: 太平洋沿岸の基地が ほぼ全滅

translation.en: All right. How many Jaegers do we have here?
Operational? Gipsy Avenger, barely.
- That's it? - Yeah.
Okay. We need more Jaegers up and running or this is gonna be a short fight.
Even if we can, all of our other pilots are either dead or severely injured.
translation.ja: パイロットも 死んだか重傷で…

translation.en: One disaster at a time. Let's just focus on those Jaegers.
translation.ja: まずイェーガーの修理だ

translation.en: Smallie, come over here.
I need you to help Jules with the repairs. Can you do that?
I thought I was kicked out.
I'm kicking you back in.
She's pretty good at turning junk into Jaegers. You good with that?
translation.ja: こいつは鉄クズで イェーガーを造れる

translation.en: Hell yeah.
All right. We got a lot of work to do and not a lot of time.
translation.ja: ぐずぐずしてられないぞ

translation.en: We got incoming!
I brought some help!
Hakuja, Shrikethorn,
translation.ja: ハクジャ シュライクソーン そしてライジン

translation.en: and the big fella, Raijin.
translation.ja: シュライクソーン そしてライジン

translation.en: I took the liberty of assigning the designations.
translation.ja: 私が怪獣に名をつけた

translation.en: Well, the spiky guy and the big idiot are moving away from the cities and towards the ocean. What does that mean?
translation.ja: ２体は都市を襲わず 海の中を進んでる

translation.en: Maybe they're trying to link up with Hakuja in the East China Sea.
translation.ja: 東シナ海のハクジャと 合流する気かも

translation.en: Yeah, I bet Newt would know what they're up to, if we can get it out of him.
translation.ja: ニュートなら きっと 理由を知ってる

translation.en: Yeah, we'd have to find him first.
translation.ja: まず彼を見つけないと

translation.en: Any Jaegers closer to those Kaiju than us?
What was left of the Chin- do and Sakhalinsk domes tried to intercept. Emphasis on tried.
translation.ja: ２つの基地から出動したが ダメだった

translation.en: I'm afraid we're on our own.
There's gotta be something here. Something in the East China Sea.
translation.ja: 東シナ海に何かあるんだ

translation.en: Maybe that's not where they're headed. Pull up a map of Kaiju movement from the war.
translation.ja: 別の場所かも 戦時中の怪獣の動きは？

translation.en: Pushing data to main display.
What, do you know something we don't?
You said we need to understand our enemy's objective to know we've beaten them.
translation.ja: “敵に勝つには 敵の狙いを知れ”だろ

translation.en: What if the Kaiju weren't blindly attacking our cities during the war?
translation.ja: 戦時中の怪獣の狙いは 都市ではなく⸺

translation.en: What if we were just in their way?
Right here.
Mount Fuji, Japan.
Extrapolate for Hakuja, Shrikethorn and Raijin.
translation.ja: 今 怪獣が進んでる先は？

translation.en: Mount Fuji? But why?
Rare earth elements.
Mount Fuji is a volcano rich in rare earth elements.
translation.ja: 富士山は火山だから レアアースが豊富

translation.en: Kaiju blood reacts extremely violently with rare earth elements is the basis of my fuel- thruster experiments. Excuse me.
translation.ja: 私の研究では怪獣の血は レアアースに激しく反応する

translation.en: - Whoa. That sounds bad. That's bad, right? - Very.
translation.ja: そいつは まずいな 富士山は活火山だから 地圧も高い

translation.en: Mount Fuji's active. A geological pressure point.
translation.ja: 富士山は活火山だから 地圧も高い

translation.en: Based on the blood to mass ratio of the Kaiju, the reaction would cause a cascade event,
translation.ja: 大量の怪獣の血が反応すれば それに連鎖し⸺

translation.en: igniting the Ring of Fire around the Pacific Rim.
translation.ja: 環太平洋火山帯が噴火する

translation.en: Billions of tons of toxic gas and ash will spew into the atmosphere,
translation.ja: 数十億トンもの有毒ガスや 火山灰が噴き出し⸺

translation.en: wiping out all life.
And finish terraforming the Earth for the Precursors.
translation.ja: そしてプリカーサーが 地球に移住する

translation.en: We can't let them reach Mount Fuji.
I'm gonna check with Jules for Jaeger repairs.
Even if we had a hundred Jaegers, there's no way to intercept in time.
translation.ja: 今 出動したって 間に合わない

translation.en: What about your thruster pods?
Oh, no, no, no. They're not ready.
translation.ja: ダメだ　今の段階では

translation.en: Can they be?
Well, in theory, maybe, with your help.
Gottlieb, what does that mean, in theory?
Today,
it means yes.
Saber Athena, Guardian Bravo and Bracer Phoenix are good to go.
It's not a lot to work with.
Liwen can patch some Fury tech into Gipsy that might help.
translation.ja: リーウェンが ジプシーの改良を

translation.en: Hey...
- Prep everything we got for deployment. - Okay.
translation.ja: 全機を出動させる いいわ

translation.en: Don't get yourself killed.
You either.
Well, that's confusing.
Let's just stay focused.
We got four Jaegers against two Category- Fours and a Fiver.
It's better than just Gipsy.
We still need pilots.
We have them.
Oh, shit.
If my dad was here, he'd probably give you a big speech.
Make you feel invincible.
I'm not my father.
I'm not a hero like he was.
Like Raleigh Becket and Mako Mori.
translation.ja: ローリーやマコは 英雄だったが⸺

translation.en: But they didn't start out that way.
They started out as cadets, just like you.
translation.ja: お前らと同じ訓練生だった

translation.en: We remember them as giants because they stood tall.
translation.ja: 力を合わせ 勇敢に戦ったから

translation.en: Because they stood together.
It doesn't matter who your parents are, where you came from, who believed in you and who didn't.
translation.ja: 親が誰かとか 過去のことは関係ない

translation.en: We are a family now.
And we are Earth's last defense.
This is our time, this is our chance to make a difference.
translation.ja: 俺たちの 力を証明するチャンスだ

translation.en: Now let's mount up and get it done! Do you understand?
translation.ja: イェーガーに乗り 任務を やり遂げろ！

translation.en: Yes, sir!
Jaeger pilots, do you understand?
translation.ja: パイロットよ　分かったか！

translation.en: Yes, sir!
Do you understand?
Yes, sir!
Now help me save the world. Let's do this.
translation.ja: 一緒に世界を救うぞ　出動だ

translation.en: Initiating neural handshake.
translation.ja: ブレイン･ ハンドシェイク開始

translation.en: Amara, jump in there!
Neural handshake strong and steady.
So, how does it feel to be in a real Jaeger?
translation.ja: 本物のイェーガーは どう？

translation.en: Bigger's not bad.
All right, all Jaegers sound off. Go- no- go for launch.
translation.ja: 出動準備は できたか？

translation.en: Guardian Bravo, go.
translation.ja: ガーディアン 準備よし

translation.en: Saber Athena, go.
translation.ja: セイバー 準備よし

translation.en: Bracer Phoenix, let's go already.
translation.ja: ブレーサー いつでもいいわ

translation.en: Copy that.
Command, we are go for launch.
translation.ja: 司令部へ　出動準備完了

translation.en: Roger, Gipsy Avenger.
Ignition in 10 seconds.
Nine,
eight,
seven, six,
five, four,
three, two,
one.
Ignition!
Exceeding structural limits.
translation.ja: 機体の限界を超えています

translation.en: What the hell?
My grandmother used to play it for me. Keeps me calm.
translation.ja: 祖母が好きだった歌だ 落ち着ける

translation.en: What about me? Not calm, man, not calm.
translation.ja: 俺は これ聴いても 落ち着けないよ

translation.en: I knew it would work.
Gipsy to Command. Targets acquired.
Roger that, Gipsy.
Everyone in the city is secured in underground shelters. You are clear to engage.
translation.ja: 市民の避難は完了　攻撃可能だ

translation.en: Solid copy. Going hot.
Bracer Phoenix, on me. We'll take Raijin.
translation.ja: ブレーサー ライジンと戦うぞ

translation.en: Roger that, Gipsy.
Saber Athena, Guardian Bravo,
translation.ja: セイバーとガーディアンは あとの２体を

translation.en: - you take the other two. - Copy that.
translation.ja: セイバーとガーディアンは あとの２体を 了解

translation.en: It's our turn to save the world.
- Let's hope so. - On my mark.
Three, two, one... Mark!
Fire!
Gipsy, Raijin's face plates
are absorbing the hits and throwing the energy back at you!
translation.ja: 攻撃を吸収し はね返す

translation.en: Let's see it absorb this!
How many buildings can this thing take?
Shrikethorn inbound!
Hey, guys, we could use a little help over here! Right now!
translation.ja: こっちに助けに来て 早く

translation.en: Copy that, Saber.
Vik, take out Shrikethorn!
translation.ja: シュライクソーンを倒せ

translation.en: On it.
Saber Athena, Guardian Bravo coming to assist!
translation.ja: セイバー　助けに行くぞ

translation.en: Activating arc whip!
Yeah, that's right! You better run!
These things ain't that tough.
Bracer Phoenix, watch your six! Hostile inbound!
translation.ja: ブレーサー 真後ろに敵だ！

translation.en: Copy that!
Okay, we're going with giant robots again.
All right, real original, guys. I'm not impressed. I am not impressed.
translation.ja: 創意工夫がないな まったく感心できないぞ

translation.en: We've got movement! Multiple hostiles, three kilometers southeast.
translation.ja: 南東３キロに 複数の敵が出現

translation.en: Liwen! Are you reading this?
translation.ja: リーウェン ここは？

translation.en: That's one of my automated factories.
It was Newt. He's in Tokyo.
translation.ja: 東京にいる ニュートンのしわざよ

translation.en: Locating his position.
Hostiles, one klick away and closing fast!
All Jaegers, brace for contact.
Disengage and brace for contact!
Okay. All right.
Let's go, all right, go, go, go! Go, baby, go, baby!
translation.ja: その調子だ 行け行け ベイビー

translation.en: Where they going?
Well, he's pretty big.
All Jaegers, advance and fire everything you've got on my command!
translation.ja: 俺が合図したら 全機で突撃するぞ！

translation.en: Go!
Guardian, stand down!
translation.ja: ガーディアン よせ

translation.en: We've got this!
Negative! That's an order!
Freaking teenagers!
- Go for the eyes! - Which ones?
translation.ja: 目を狙うぞ どの目を？

translation.en: All of them.
Ilya, Suresh, report.
Do you copy? Come on, guys, sound off!
translation.ja: 聞こえるか　応答しろ

translation.en: Guardian Bravo, give me a sitrep. You guys okay?
translation.ja: ガーディアン 無事なのか？

translation.en: Guardian's down. I'm pinned in the Conn- Pod.
translation.ja: 倒されて ポッドを出られません

translation.en: Suresh?
Suresh didn't make it, sir.
Copy, Guardian.
You just stay put, and we'll send you help as soon as we can.
Bracer Phoenix, report.
You guys okay?
We're a little banged up, but we're still in the fight.
translation.ja: 損傷はありますが⸺ 戦えます

translation.en: Us, too, Saber.
translation.ja: 我々もです セイバー･アテナも

translation.en: I mean, Saber Athena, sir!
Saber, Bracer, prepare to intercept at the following coordinates.
translation.ja: 送信する座標に向かえ

translation.en: Let's finish this.
Move your ass. And don't be late.
Copy. Bracer Phoenix hauling ass!
translation.ja: 了解 大至急 行きます

translation.en: Gipsy to Command, do you have a tactical scan of the hostile?
translation.ja: 司令部　敵のデータは？

translation.en: Assessing data from their sensors.
We have it, Gipsy, but it's still compiling.
No time. Can you locate the brains?
translation.ja: 急げ　脳は どこにある？

translation.en: Hostile's central brain mass is heavily armored. Your weapons won't be able to penetrate.
translation.ja: 脳の中枢は固く守られてる

translation.en: What about a secondary brain? This son of a bitch have one of those?
translation.ja: あいつには 第２の脳はないのか？

translation.en: Hostile has three secondary brains. One for each component Kaiju.
translation.ja: ３体が合体したから 第２の脳も３つだ

translation.en: Sending intel.
Package confirmed for Saber Athena.
translation.ja: セイバー 情報を受信

translation.en: Confirmed for Bracer Phoenix.
All right, team, follow my lead and stay alert!
translation.ja: よし 俺の指示に従え

translation.en: Fire up some of that Fury tech Liwen grabbed us.
translation.ja: フューリーの武器を使う

translation.en: Read my mind, partner.
Eject! Eject!
All pilots eject!
Amara!
Warning. Neural load exceeding limit.
translation.ja: 神経負荷が 限界を超えています

translation.en: - Nate! Nate! - Warning.
translation.ja: ネイト ネイト しっかりしろ

translation.en: Nate, stay with me! Stay with me!
translation.ja: ネイト しっかりしろ

translation.en: - Get up! Nate! -
Pilot down!
Get up from that, you pile of junk!
translation.ja: 立ってみろ ガラクタめ

translation.en: Bye!
Liwen! Is there anything you can do to help?
translation.ja: リーウェン 何か手は？

translation.en: I need more time!
We don't have any!
translation.ja: 敵が富士山に着いたら…

translation.en: - If the hostile reaches Mount Fuji... - Understood.
translation.ja: 敵が富士山に着いたら… 分かってる

translation.en: Not gonna let that happen.
Jake, you can't operate Gipsy without a co- pilot!
The strain will tear your mind apart!
What do we do now?
- Regroup with the others. - Amara!
translation.ja: 仲間と合流して アマーラ

translation.en: Gipsy Avenger, this is Amara Namani.
translation.ja: ジプシー･アベンジャー こちらアマーラ

translation.en: Stand by for assist.
Amara, don't.
- You won't make it. - I'm gonna!
Don't! Don't!
I told you.
Since when do I listen?
Amara, you're up.
What are you doing?
Getting the hell out of your way.
You got this, brother.
Ejection sequence initiated.
Ejection sequence successful.
You ready for this, smallie?
One way to find out.
Okay.
Stand by, Command. Initiating neural handshake.
translation.ja: ブレイン･ハンドシェイクを 開始する

translation.en: Establishing neural link.
Yeah, that was supposed to be epic,
translation.ja: カッコよく いかなかった

translation.en: - but it wasn't. - Definitely not.
Warning. Cascade failure. Multiple systems offline.
translation.ja: 複数のシステムの接続が中断 再起動

translation.en: - Reboot. - Okay, I'm on it.
Command to Gipsy.
Hostile is two kilometers from the summit of Mount Fuji and closing fast!
translation.ja: 敵は富士山頂まで２キロ 急ぐんだ

translation.en: Gottlieb, do you have enough fuel left in your thrusters to launch us into the atmosphere?
translation.ja: 大気圏の外へ飛べる燃料は 残ってるか？

translation.en: - The atmosphere? - Yeah.
Possibly, but there won't be enough to slow your reentry.
We don't need to slow down.
We're gonna drop Gipsy right on top of that thing.
I just ejected my escape pod.
Yeah. We'll have to use mine.
Jake, there's only one thruster with enough fuel remaining.
Sending location.
All right, checking.
We're too far away.
We're not gonna make it.
Gipsy Avenger, transport inbound.
translation.ja: ジプシー･アベンジャー

translation.en: Remote systems are online. Sending help!
Scrapper!
I've located the thruster pod! Stand by!
translation.ja: 推進機を見つけた　待ってて

translation.en: Come on, come on! Move them little legs!
The thruster's way too strong, there's no way we can hold on to it!
translation.ja: つかまって飛ぶのは無理よ

translation.en: Liwen, what do you got?
I can weld it to your hand.
I upgraded Scrapper's weapons.
translation.ja: スクラッパーの武器で

translation.en: Nice. I was actually gonna do that.
No, you wasn't.
Yes, I was.
We only got one shot at this.
Yeah! Then let's make it count.
- I'm stuck! -
Stay there! You're an extra ton we can drop on that thing!
translation.ja: 少しでも重い方がいい

translation.en: - She's coming apart! - Almost there!
translation.ja: 機体が壊れる あと少しだ

translation.en: We're drifting off course!
translation.ja: コースが それてる

translation.en: Use the plasma cannon!
Disengaging safety protocol!
Plasma cannon engaged.
translation.ja: プラズマ･キャノン起動

translation.en: Warning. Exceeding structural limits.
translation.ja: 機体の限界を超えています

translation.en: It's working!
Hold on!
- Come on! Come on! -
Target locked!
Jake, Amara, you need to eject!
Disconnect!
Amara, disconnect!
I will catch you! I promise!
translation.ja: 必ずキャッチしてやる

translation.en: Come on!
- I've got you. -
Gipsy to Command, we're getting the hell out of here!
translation.ja: こちらジプシー　脱出する

translation.en: Escape pod failure.
No.
No, no, no!
I'm sorry, smallie.
For what?
We got to save the world.
Your dad would be proud.
Scrapper! - Hurry! - Get over here! Hurry up!
translation.ja: スクラッパー こっちだ　早く！

translation.en: Move! We have to go!
Twenty kilometers to impact. Get out of there!
translation.ja: 衝突まで20キロ　脱出しろ！

translation.en: Go! Go!
We're in! Close the door!
- Hang on! - I am hanging on!
translation.ja: つかまれ！ つかまってる

translation.en: Hang tighter!
No! No!
Okay, you know what?
Plan B. Always a Plan B.
Anyone who's listening,
this is Ranger Lambert. Be advised, we just caught ourselves a Newt.
translation.ja: レンジャー･ランバートだ ニュートを捕まえた

translation.en: Copy that.
There he is. I'm glad you're still okay, man.
translation.ja: お前が無事で よかった

translation.en: You, too, brother. I knew you could do it.
translation.ja: お前もな　信じてたよ

translation.en: Well, I had a lot of help.
Nice work, Ranger Namani.
translation.ja: 見事だ レンジャー･ナマーニ

translation.en: Thank you, sir.
Never seen snow before.
So out of all the things to notice right now, you're noticing snow?
Big, dead Kaiju is right there. - Okay, okay, all right. - And I'm not sure if you're...
translation.ja: すぐそこにデカい怪獣が…

translation.en: Is this the part where you're gonna give me one of those big, dumb speeches?
translation.ja: 今 バカなスピーチ？

translation.en: Did everyone think it was dumb, or is that just your opinion...
Just be honest. How many times did you practice that in front of the mirror?
It was motivational. You can be whoever you wanna be.
- Okay. Now you wanna play that? - Fire!
- I'm a natural at this. - No, you're not a natural because...
Oh! Give me a break. I've never done this before!
There you go. Boom!
We did it!
You think this is over, huh? You think you've saved your crappy little world?
translation.ja: 世界を救えたと 思ってるのか？

translation.en: We're gonna keep coming!
translation.ja: 我々は あきらめない

translation.en: We are never going to stop and sooner or later  your luck is going to run out!
translation.ja: 地球を襲い続ける じきに運は尽きるぞ

translation.en: Nah.
The things in your head? The Precursors?
translation.ja: 頭の中のプリカーサーに 伝えろ

translation.en: Tell them we're not afraid.
Tell them, next time, they won't need to worry about coming for us.
translation.ja: 次回は地球に来なくてもいい

translation.en: Because we're gonna come for them.
